---
name: Mastodon post template for featured tools
about: Short, no-nonsense Mastodon text you can copy when promoting a featured tool.
---

TL;DR: {Tool} — {one-line description}

Why it matters: {one-sentence reason, e.g. 'lightweight audio editor, zero-cost, cross-platform.'}

Link: {repo or site}

Tags: #OpenSource #FOSS #TechnoBrutalism

Example:
Audacity — Simple multi-track audio editor. Lightweight, cross-platform, zero-cost.
https://github.com/audacity/audacity
#OpenSource #FOSS #TechnoBrutalism

Keep it <= 280 characters when possible. Use screenshot attachment for better visibility.
